data.message:
FB please help my name is Dedeca Ann White Hogan someone used Ann Hogan a pic of my daughter and have pics of 
Me and made a profile you reviewed and said this does not violate any of your policy. How can I have our pics and my name removed from this fraudulent account. Please contact me    with advice

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that you're experiencing this, Dedeca. If someone created a Facebook profile pretending to be you, please file a report through our Help Center at: http://bit.ly/2vJ83qh. -Ashley
